data.name: NC NEWS API Backend
data.description: A RESTful API for NC NEWS, built with Node.js, Express,js, and PostgreSQL led by Test Driven Development using Jest, which provides endpoints to retrive articles, to post & delete comments, and to update votes on articles,

data.name: NC NEWS Web
data.description: A reddit-like website that allows users to browse news articles by topic, to comment and delete their comments on articles, and vote/downvote on articles

data.name: Trailblaze
data.description: A social exercise app where users can record exercises, set challenges for self and against friends

data.name: Dress Smart (In Progress)
data.description: A unqiue, user-friendly app that combines real-time weather forecasting with personal wardrobe suggestions.

data.name: Portofolio Website
data.description: Responsive portofolio website that showcase my projects and a little about me
